document.full_text: verizon communications  has agreed to pay $93.5 million to settle allegations that it overcharged the u.s. government on contracts for voice and data services, the u.s. justice department said on tuesday.
document.title: verizon pays $93.5 million to settle false claims case
lines_and_colors: verizon communications  has agreed to pay $93.5 million to settle allegations that it overcharged the u.s. government on contracts for voice and data services, the u.s. justice department said on tuesday.
